description:
After a long absence, Joe returns to Tange Gym where he is welcomed with open arms. He pays his respect at Rikiishi’s grave and swears to return to the ring.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Man, One Flower... Wager in the Ring
Otoko Ippiki Hana Ichirin... Ring ni Kaketa
Un boxeur solitaire... et son come-back
男一匹花一輪... リングに賭けた
